doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 51 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/11/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 51 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/11/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Joyce Hunter, Darrell Yates Rist, and Tom Stoddard2. Catholic bishop forbids AIDS Project Los Angeles from holding seminars in Catholic buildings due to the project's endorsement of condom use3. National Gay Rights Advocates win $3 million settlement for San Francisco homosexuals who were denied employment or promotion by Pacific Bell4. Discussion of the New York Board of Education's AIDS awareness film, "Sex, Drug, and AIDS"5. Discussion of bathhouses and the possible reopening of NYC's largest, St Mark's Bathhouse6. Discussion of the State Department's requirement for HTLVIII testing for applicants and employeesCOMMERCIAL: Stamp Out AIDS featuring Jennifer Bassey7. Andy Humm on refusing to cooperate with AIDS-discriminatory job practicesCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine8. World Health Organization finds AIDS rates may soar in Latin America and Asia9. Justice Sandra Day O'Connor finds that the Supreme Court's decision on the Georgia sodomy case may be altered by further prosecution and hearings10. Austin, Texas, proposal for banning the discrimination on the basis of sexual preference generally supported11. Alabama, Birmingham News requires job applicants to take HIV test and bans those positive from jobs12. Jackson, Mississippi, State bans language of sexual equality from Constitution, opting for ban on "gender" discrimination only13. San Francisco, National Gay Rights Advocates issue complaint against Health America's rejection of all San Francisco applicants in order to avoid AIDS-positive applicants14. Sports ReportCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp15. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Announcement, 1986 Sydney Gay Mardi Gras program preview party, with clipsCOMMERCIAL: The Monster2. Show Bits with George Trahanis, review of The High Heeled Women's "It's A Broad, Broad, Broad World," with clipsCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape" gay magazine3. "Just Ask Raz" advice segmentCOMMERCIAL: The World of Video4. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 51 [2]--The Right Stuff [Air Date: 12/11/1986]: December 1986
